pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, September 12, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. Andrews, New Brunswick

Private meetings

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus Retreat and deliver brief remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
